name: BMX Stickman Race - eXtreme Freestyle Racing & Crazy Stunts Games
name_original: BMX Stickman Race - eXtreme Freestyle Racing & Crazy Stunts Games
description:
Get ready for a cRaZy eXtreme stickman BMX racing game! Jump and avoid a variety of obstacles as you race your way down an insane track....and towards the finish line. Will you come out victorious? Lets see!

FEATURES

- Easy tap controls.
- Lots of crazy & insane obstacles.
- Awesome stickman graphics!
